onboarding_1.title: Set Up Currency Display and Notifications
onboarding_1.money_question: Do you prefer to display amounts in Euro or Dollar?
onboarding_1.money_question_helper: To help you, amounts converted for display (according to the chosen currency) will be preceded by an asterisk (*).

onboarding_1.notifications_question_helper: Stay ahead and take advantage of the best investment opportunities.
onboarding_1.language_question: In which language would you like to use the application?

onboarding_4.title: Fund Your Account
onboarding_4.subtitle: Place your funds in one of the interest-bearing accounts via credit card, Apple Pay, or Google Pay.

transactions.title: Your Transaction History
transactions.no_transactions_1: You haven't made any transactions yet.
transactions.no_transactions_2: Fund your current account or make an investment to get started.

disclaimer: By continuing, you confirm that you have read and accepted

disclaimer.description: Amounts are rounded to the nearest cent (2 decimal places).

main_account.title: Your Current Account
main_account.description_1: Be the real owner of your funds, only you have the ability to interact with your Sovereign Current Account.
main_account.description_2: You can move money from it to your interest-bearing accounts.

investment_account.title: Your Investments
investment_account.description_1: This investment behaves like a savings account, but better!
investment_account.description_2: Lock your funds and earn interest from the first minute. Withdraw at any time.
investment_account.disclaimer: Estimated annual yield and not guaranteed.

transaction.title: This operation requires your attention
transaction.description: You are about to move {{amount}}{{currency}} from your current account to your interest-bearing account. Are you sure you want to continue?

offramp.title: Withdraw from your account
offramp.subtitle: You can withdraw funds from your account using a bank card, bank transfer, or Google Pay.
